name: Mixed Media Drawing, Inking & Watercolor
description: This course will cover several approaches to thematically driven drawing projects. Students will use watercolor, image transfers, brush pens, stencils, and traditional drawing techniques. Some supplies will be included for use during classes, and a materials list will be provided on the first class meeting for students to purchase art materials at an art store of their choosing. Students are encouraged to bring in their favorite brushes, pencils, and other materials related to this course if the
